title: 95/267/EC: Commission Decision of 30 June 1995 on financial assistance from the Community for storage in France of antigen for production of foot-and-mouth disease vaccine
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 30 June 1995 on financial assistance from the  Community for storage in France of antigen for production of foot-and-mouth disease vaccine (Text  with EEA relevance) (95/267/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Community shall grant France financial assistance for the  stocking of antigen for production of foot-and-mouth disease vaccine.
The Laboratoire de pathologie bovine at Lyons in France shall hold the stock of antigen  to which Article 1 relates. The provisions of Article 4 of Council Decision 91/666/EEC shall  apply.
The Community's financial assistance shall be a maximum of ECU 70  000 for the period 1  January to 31 December 1995.

The Community's financial assistance shall be paid as follows:
-  70  % by way of an advance at France's request,
-  the balance following presentation of supporting documents.
These documents must be presented before 1 February 1996.
Articles 8 and 9 of Council Regulation (EEC) No 729/70 shall apply mutatis mutandis.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 June 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
